Key Match Events: Alex Hales hit 53 in 40 balls on his first England outing since March 2019
Luke Wood took three wickets on debut
Harry Brook finished the job with a fluent 42 not out, including the winning four in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Alex Hales' return to international cricket after a 3-year exile was a major talking point before the match
Post-Match Reflections: Alex Hales celebrated his return to international cricket with a crucial half-century
Miscellaneous Highlights: England had earlier done well to restrict the hosts to 158 for seven
The match was played in front of a sell-out 35,000 crowd at Karachi's National Stadium
Others: The article mentions that this was England's first match in Pakistan for almost 17 years
